content:
Here is the cleaned up text:

You are here: Salesforce Help > Docs > Service Cloud > Lightning Article Editor

Author knowledge articles easily and more effectively with the new Lightning Article Editor. Give your knowledge authors and managers a more user-friendly and powerful authoring experience, so they can create and maintain high-quality articles to better serve your customersâ€™ needs.

To use the Lightning Article Editor, you must enable the Lightning Article Editor release update. See Manage Release Updates for instructions about selecting and enabling a release update.

The Lightning Article Editor is backward-compatible, meaning that all articles you authored in the old editor look the same in the new editor.

Some key features of the new Lightning article editor include:

* A full-screen mode
* Advanced table editing support
* An accessibility checker
* Seamless copy/pasting from external sources

Features Comparison:

The tables that follow list the capabilities available in the previous Knowledge Article Editor and the Lightning Knowledge Article Editor.

Text Formatting Capabilities Comparison:
CAPABILITY	AVAILABLE IN THE LIGHTNING EDITOR	AVAILABLE IN THE PREVIOUS EDITOR
Line Height (setting the vertical distance between two lines of type)	Yes	No

Table Editing Capabilities Comparison:
CAPABILITY	AVAILABLE IN THE LIGHTNING EDITOR	AVAILABLE IN THE PREVIOUS EDITOR
Add and Remove Table Rows and Columns	Yes	No
Resize Table Cells	Yes	No
Merge Table Cells	Yes	No
Format Table Border	Yes	No
Format Table Background	Yes	No

Media Support Capabilities Comparison:
CAPABILITY	AVAILABLE IN THE LIGHTNING EDITOR	AVAILABLE IN THE PREVIOUS EDITOR
Alternative Text (Alt Text) for Images	Yes	No

Productivity Enhancement Capabilities Comparison:
CAPABILITY	AVAILABLE IN THE LIGHTNING EDITOR	AVAILABLE IN THE PREVIOUS EDITOR
Text Search & Replace	Yes	No
Word Counter	Yes	No
Accessibility Checker	Yes	No
title: Lightning Article Editor: Create Knowledge Articles Easily
